schoolInfo.title: About Us
paragraphs: Hello, we are Language Galaxy, and we are happy to welcome you to our page. The school was founded in 2021.

Our language school is a space where language becomes a part of life, not just a subject. We have combined Cambridge University methodologies, a communicative approach, and modern digital tools to make every lesson dynamic, practical, and engaging.

Language is the key to new people and cultures. That's why we've created a warm community where you can make mistakes, joke, and celebrate your first successes. After just three lessons, you'll feel: 'Wow, I can really speak!'
howWeTeachList: Communication first. We speak from the very first lesson; grammar rules are picked up organically.
Projects instead of tests. You record a podcast, create a travel blog, or prepare a pitch deck—all in the language you are learning.
Individual roadmap. Every month, you receive a progress report and a plan for the next 4 weeks.
Soft deadlines. Missed a deadline? The system will remind you and help you catch up without stress.

cards.title: Innovative Methodology

questions.question: What languages can be studied at your school?
questions.answer: At our school, you can master English, Korean, Chinese, and Japanese. Learn what inspires you: from English classics to anime or K-pop.

questions.question: What learning format do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer full online courses and speaking clubs. Everything without leaving your home. Pajamas are an acceptable dress code.

questions.question: Is it possible to take a trial lesson?
questions.answer: We do not offer individual trial lessons, but some course materials may be available for preview. Besides, our courses are so engaging that there's no turning back after the first module.

questions.question: How do I sign up for a course?
questions.answer: You can choose a course you're interested in on our website, click 'Details,' and place your order through the cart. After payment, you will receive access to the materials and instructions via email.

questions.question: How is payment made?
questions.answer: Payment can be made online through our website using a bank card or electronic wallets. We use a secure online payment system so you can learn without any worries.

questions.question: Do you have offline classes?
questions.answer: We are a school of the future: everything is online! You can even make coffee during a class.

questions.question: Who are the teachers at the school?
questions.answer: Our teachers are not just language experts, but true motivators, philologists, polyglots, and a bit of a psychologist. All with experience, certificates, and a love for their work.

questions.question: From what age can one start learning?
questions.answer: It's never too early or too late to learn. Our courses are suitable for everyone from 12 years old to infinity.

questions.question: Can I purchase just one lesson?
questions.answer: We only sell full courses, as only a systematic approach yields results. One lesson is like a single episode without the series: interesting, but not enough.

questions.question: What should I do if I miss a lesson?
questions.answer: Since our courses are held online in a format convenient for you, all materials are available in your personal account. You can return to a missed module at any time—the learning adapts to your schedule.

mainIntro.title: Learn with Language Galaxy
mainIntro.p1: Language Galaxy can offer you various languages and programs. Just choose the language you want to try, and if you want to test your language skills, you can always take a test. If you are interested in useful information or phrases, be sure to visit our blog.
mainIntro.p2: Take a test—and we will select the right program for you.
mainIntro.imageAlt: Astronaut and alien next to a rocket

en.text: When you start learning a language, the most important thing is to have a clear schedule and a systematic approach. Our teachers will help you with that — and even more. You can take a test to determine your language level and choose the program that suits you best.

ja.text: Japanese is not just a language — it's a whole world of culture and tradition. Our courses will help you immerse yourself in it with comfort and confidence. Take a test to find out your level and choose the best path to knowledge.

ko.text: Korean is becoming increasingly popular, and you can become a part of it starting today. We’ll help you create an effective study schedule and offer a program tailored to your level. Start with a test — it’s the first step toward confident communication.

zh.text: Learning Chinese is an exciting and fascinating journey. To succeed, it’s important to have the right approach and the support of experienced teachers. Take a short test to determine your level and choose the course that best suits your needs.
